com.vernalis.pdbconnector2.graphql

Class GraphQLField

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.vernalis.pdbconnector2.graphql.GraphQLField
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    GraphQL

    public class GraphQLField
extends java.lang.Object
implements GraphQL
    A class to represent any data field in a GraphQL query. Fields should be constructed indirectly using the GraphQLQuery.addField(String) method method
    Since:
    1.28.0
    Author:
    S.Roughley knime@vernalis.com

      • addChildField

        public void addChildField(java.lang.String fieldPath)
        Method to add a child field. The field path should be a '.'-delimited path to the field, with each segment representing another 'layer'
        Parameters:
        fieldPath - The path to the field
